Actions.Name: Add or Update Address Information
Actions.Description: Creates or updates address information for a person.

Actions.Name: Add or Update Email Address Information
Actions.Description: Creates or updates email address information for a person.

Actions.Name: Add or Update Instant Messenger Information
Actions.Description: Creates or updates instant messenger information for a person.

Actions.Name: Add or Update Phone Information
Actions.Description: Creates or updates phone information for a person.

Actions.Name: Add or Update Web Address Information
Actions.Description: Creates or updates web address information for a person.

Actions.Name: Get Employee Employment Info
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee and his/her Employment (e.g. Position, Job, Status, etc.) information.

Actions.Name: Get Employee Identity Info
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee identity (e.g. Government IDs, Visas, Passports, etc.) information.

Actions.Name: Get Employee Personal Info
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee and his/her Personal (e.g. Biographic, Demographic, etc.) information.

Actions.Name: Get Employee Qualification Info
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee education and professional qualification information.

Actions.Name: When an employee is added or updated
Actions.Description: This event is raised when an employee is added or updated.
